snippet: European ministers want a prior agreement upheld before more financing from a bailout package is granted.
abstract: European finance ministers tell Greece to accelerate the pace of economic reform by Oct 18 in exchange for further financing from a stalled bailout package.
lead_paragraph: European ministers want a prior agreement upheld before more financing from a bailout package is granted.

headline.seo: Europe Tells Greece to Speed Up Economic Reform
headline.main: Europe Tells Greece to Speed Up Economic Reform
headline.print_headline: Greece Is Given 10 Days To Adopt Internal Reforms
